Package co.there4.hexagon.web

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Request
    Lists would be initialized loading all elements when they are used (set it as lazy in implementations) this will have a performace penalty in favor of ease of use. The alternative would be using a Map/List wrapper that delegates calls to abstract methods in the interface (I wont do this just now).
    Response
    Check Request comment. And also note that lists should be updated by engines after callback is processed, this data is like a buffer that needs to be dumped to the real response.
    Session
    Provides session information.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    Client to use other REST services (like the ones created with Blacksheep).
    Exchange
    HTTP request context. It holds client supplied data and methods to change the response.
    Filter  
    Part  
    Path
    A path definition. It parses path patterns and extract values for parameters.
    Route  
    Router
    TODO Compose routers with a map of context to router (children) TODO val children: MutableMap = LinkedHashMap() TODO Add warning in Hexagon when paths DO NOT start with / or contains : (bad formats)
    Server  
    WebPackageKt  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FilterOrder
    Type of filter. Indicates when the filter is executed.
    HttpMethod
    Enum for the supported HTTP methods.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EndException
    Exception used for stopping the execution. It is used only for flow control.
    PassException
    Exception used for stopping the execution. It is used only for flow control.
